name: Mini-Game Like Bently
description:
This is a retro/nostalgic game I played on my youth on Sly Cooper Series... This is a remake of one of the mini games player by Bently. However the history is way different. Let me walk you though...

One of the biggest virus of history called BigBigOne, invaded a Supercomputer trying to access its private data and terrify the world. The anti-virus of the computer tried their best to overcome this threat but unsuccessfully failed.
Meanwhile, a simple guy responsible for the maintenance of our Supercomputer is the only hope to try to frustrate the plan of this evil virus. Will he be able to do so?
Get on board, pursuing the virus though the main components of a computer and help this little hero become victorious!!!

-- Controls --
PlayerControl: WASD or Arrows
CannonControl: Use your mouse to redirect the cannon direction and press LeftButton to shoot (you can shoot continuously by pressing down).

-- Final Notes --

This is the first game I made by myself so be aware of some bugs.
Leave a comment and tell me if you enjoyed and if it brings you flashbacks!
Thank You So Much

PS: There is an EasterEgg somewhere (^_^)
